root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicating potential data entry errors or system integration issues.
Duplicate bank records suggest inadequate reconciliation processes.
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatement risk due to duplicate transactions

remediations.action: Implement enhanced data validation checks and automated alerts for AR entries exceeding predefined thresholds.
remediations.estimated_effort: 2 weeks with a dedicated team of 3 data analysts
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% in the next quarter

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include automated duplicate detection and manual review protocols.
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank records in subsequent reconciliations
